articles.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of VMware ESXi. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-1021: VMware ESXi TCP/IP Memory Corruption Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Siemens Simcenter Femap. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that the target must visit a malicious page or open a malicious file.
articles.title: ZDI-22-1025: Siemens Simcenter Femap NEU File Parsing Out-Of-Bounds Write Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Microsoft Windows. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-1024: Microsoft Windows win32kfull UMPDDrvStartBanding Use-After-Free Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

AWS Lambda announces support for lambda:SourceFunctionArn. A new IAM condition key that can be used for IAM policy conditions that specify the ARN of the function from which a request is made.
